SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

Class AI

java.lang.Object
  AI

public class AI
extends java.lang.Object

It encodes for a single turn that is playable by the Computer (AI). The method 'AIturn' is the actual flag-bearer for this class as it diverts the flow of conditioned execution.

Version:
( 1.0 [24/12/15] )
Author:
(Mehul Ahal)

Field Summary
(package private) static java.awt.Point[] adjSearch
           
(package private) static boolean[] hitting
           
(package private) static java.awt.Point lastHit
           
 
Constructor Summary
AI()
           
 
Method Summary
static void AImakeShips(Board commBoard)
          Method AImakeShips constructs legal Ships for the COMPUTER (AI)'s Board.
static boolean AIshipVal(Board commBoard, java.awt.Point point, int direct)
          Method AIshipVal returns true if a given Ship is leagally placeable on a given Board.
static void AIturn(Board playerBoard, Board guessBoard, AI artInt)
          Method AIturn contitutes a single turn for the COMPUTER (AI), by coordinating the seach for Ships and 'hitting' on them.
static boolean AIvalidate(Board playerBoard, java.awt.Point guess)
          Method AIvalidate returns true if a guess is legal for a Board, or false otherwise.
static void checkAndMark(Board playerBoard, Board guessBoard, java.awt.Point guess, AI artInt)
          Method checkAndMark determines if a given Point is a 'hit' or a 'miss' on a given 'playerBoard', and also marks it on the Board accordingly.
static boolean checkRepeated(java.awt.Point[] locus)
          Method checkRepeated returns true if the given Point[] doesn't contain two or more equal Points, and false otherwise.
static void hitAdj(Board playerBoard, Board guessBoard, Ship ship, AI artInt)
          Method hitAdj used to 'hit' a Ship along its length, while 'hitting' is active, and stops only when the Ship is 'sunk' (Ship.isSunk == true)
static void hitShips(Board playerBoard, Board guessBoard, java.awt.Point lastHit, AI artInt)
          Method hitShips gets activated after the COMPUTER (AI) scores a 'hit' on a Ship, and is used to continue 'hitting' on that Ship.

                          Board guessBoard,
                          Ship ship,
                          AI artInt)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Method hitAdj used to 'hit' a Ship along its length, while 'hitting' is active, and stops only when the Ship is 'sunk' (Ship.isSunk == true)
